job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtatlassian can hire people in any country where we have a legal entity assuming candidates have eligible working rights and a sufficient timezone overlap with their team as our offices reopen atlassians can choose to work remotely or return to an office unless its necessary for the role to be performed in the office interviews and onboarding are conducted virtually a part of being a distributedfirst company ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltugtjob dutiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwork within the companys confluence team directly impacting enduser experiences through the software design and software implementation of new features and functionalities within the confluence unit deliver efficient innovative software engineering improvements to confluence products and produce software solutions directly tailored to enduser needs work with java to construct faulttolerant reliable and durable software systems evaluate software engineering tradeoffs between correctness robustness performance space and time work on the companys large scale distributed systems building microservices and utilizing agile software development methodologies xp scrum produce continuous delivery and infrastructure as code evaluate tradeoffs between correctness robustness performance space and timeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtminimum requirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtmasters degree in computer science computer engineering or a related field of study plus two years experience working with java andor other server side programming languages ie python golang c php working with microservices oriented architecture and extensible rest apis evaluating tradeoffs between correctness robustness performance space and time working in saas paas iaas industry with public or private cloud offerings eg aws gae azure or with distributed systems working in any database technology eg rdbms like oracle postgres or mysql andor nosql like dynamodb or cassandraltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtalternate requirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtbachelors degree in computer science computer engineering or a related field of study plus five years experience working with java andor other server side programming languages ie python golang c php working with microservices oriented architecture and extensible rest apis evaluating tradeoffs between correctness robustness performance space and time working in saas paas iaas industry with public or private cloud offerings eg aws gae azure or with distributed systems working in any database technology eg rdbms like oracle postgres or mysql andor nosql like dynamodb or cassandraltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtspecial requirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtmust pass technical interviewltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtmore about our benefitsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwhether you work in an office or a distributed team atlassian is highly collaborative and yes fun to support you at work and play we offer some fantastic perks ample time off to relax and recharge flexible working options five paid volunteer days a year for your favourite cause an annual allowance to support your learning ampamp growth unique shipit days a company paid trip after five years and lots moreltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtmore about atlassianltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtcreating software that empowers everyone from small startups to the whos who of tech is why were here we build tools like jira confluence bitbucket and trello to help teams across the world become more nimble creative and alignedcollaboration is the heart of every product we dream of at atlassian from amsterdam and austin to sydney and san francisco were looking for people who want to write the future and who believe that we can accomplish so much more together than apart at atlassian were committed to an environment where everyone has the autonomy and freedom to thrive as well as the support of likeminded colleagues who are motivated by a common goal to unleash the potential of every team ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtadditional informationltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwe believe that the unique contributions of all atlassians is the driver of our success to make sure that our products and culture continue to incorporate everyones perspectives and experience we never discriminate on the basis of race religion national origin gender identity or expression sexual orientation age or marital veteran or disability statusltbrgtltbrgtall your information will be kept confidential according to eeo guidelinesltbrgtltbrgtif your experience looks a little different from what weve identified and you think you can rock the role wed love to learn more about youltbrgtltbrgtlearn more about atlassians culture interviewing flow and hiring process by checking out our candidate resource hub
